definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: Cancer treatments and strong painkillers like morphine can also cause itchiness .
sentences.chinese: 癌症療法和止痛片象嗎啡也可以引起搔癢。

sentences.english: I only feel mild pain. I don't think a pain-killer is necessary.
sentences.chinese: 我只感到有稍微的疼痛，我想用不着喫止痛片。

sentences.english: Aching when eat acetanilide piece effective?
sentences.chinese: 心痛的時候喫止痛片有效嗎？
你是否需要些止痛片呢？

sentences.english: Well. You should take a painkiller now.
sentences.chinese: 哦，你現在應該喫片止痛片。

sentences.english: Broke two ribs. But I've got good painkillers, " said Brian/Ribby.
sentences.chinese: 不過我有很好的止痛片。
